citation: Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Offensive Advertising) Act 2017 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Offensive Advertising) Act 2017

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Offensive Advertising) Act 2017 fix 1 June 2017 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 May 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

M. T. (RENE) HIDDING

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 31 May 2017

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
